title: Why Robot Adoption Stings Profit at First? New Research Reveals Insights
description: Recent research conducted by the University of Cambridge reveals that the adoption of robots in industries can lead to a ‘U-shaped’ impact on profits, initially causing profit margins to decline before eventually rising again. The study analyzed industry data from the UK and 24 other European countries over a span of more than two decades, ... Read more

title: Ethereum Braces for Death Cross Downtrend, While Tradecurve Pumps 150%
description: It seems that the crypto market is in a state of flux, and Ethereum (ETH) is no exception as it braces for a possible death cross downtrend. Meanwhile, Tradecurve (TCRV) is enjoying a 150% pump in its presale, with discounted tokens still available for purchase. Let’s take a look at the Ethereum and Tradecurve price [...]

title: Financial Giants Turn to Ethereum Futures ETFs After Bitcoin – Potential to Propel ETH Back to $4,000
description: Major financial institutions are turning to Ethereum futures ETFs. ETF can potentially unleash a massive $30 trillion in capital if the SEC grants its approval.  Following the spot Bitcoin ETF applications in mid-June 2023, major financial institutions are shifting their focus toward Ethereum futures ETFs. This development has sparked great enthusiasm within the crypto community [...]
